thread.title: More than 800,000 Fords recalled for faulty Takata airbags
thread.title_full: More than 800,000 Fords recalled for faulty Takata airbags

author: Reese Counts
title: More than 800,000 Fords recalled for faulty Takata airbags
text:
More than 800,000 Fords recalled for faulty Takata airbags The list includes the Ford GT, Mustang, and Fusion. Create alerts for any tag below Subscribe RECALL HELP 
Get recall details from the NHTSA and find out what to do if your car been recalled.
